concept.title: Set the Plot Scale for a Layout
concept.shortdesc: When you specify a scale to output your drawing, you can choose froma list of real-world scales, enter

conbody.p: your own scale, or choose Fit to Paper to scale the drawing to fit onto the selected paper size. Usually, the objects in model space are displayed at the scale set in layout viewports. To plot the objects in model space with the scale specified in layouts, you assign the scale to 1:1.
